original_text: Behold, all ye that kindle a fire, that compass yourselves about with sparks: walk in the light of your fire, and in the sparks that ye have kindled. This shall ye have of mine hand; ye shall lie down in sorrow.
korean_text: 보라 불을 피우고 횃불을 둘러 띤 자여 너희가 다 너희의 불꽃 가운데로 걸어가며 너희가 피운 횃불 가운데로 걸어갈지어다 너희가 내 손에서 얻을 것이 이것이라 너희가 고통이 있는 곳에 누우리라

sentences.original_text: Behold, all ye that kindle a fire
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 너희 중 불을 피우는 모든 자여

sentences.original_text: that compass yourselves about with sparks
walk in light of your fire
and in sparks that ye have kindled
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 피운 불꽃 속에서 걸으라

sentences.original_text: This shall ye have of mine hand
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 너희가 내 손에서 받을 것이라

sentences.original_text: ye shall lie down in sorrow
